deepseek-chat.description: High-performance model for general tasks (DeepSeek-V3-0324). Supports JSON output, function calling, and FIM completion.

deepseek-reasoner.description: Advanced reasoning model with transparent thinking process (DeepSeek-R1-0528). Output includes CoT reasoning and final answer.

deepseek-v3-0324.description: DeepSeek-V3 model from March 2024. Supports JSON output, function calling, chat prefix completion, and FIM completion.

deepseek-r1-0528.description: DeepSeek-R1 reasoning model from May 2024. Features transparent chain-of-thought reasoning with output not counting toward context limit.
